description.value:
You inscribe a circle of arcane runes that dampen enemies' magic. You create a glowing magic circle in a @Template[type:burst|distance:5] within 30 feet. Creatures in the circle gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic. The circle lasts until the end of your next turn, and you can Sustain it, to a maximum duration of 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Spell Protection Array]
